answers.answer: No, it has nothing to do with HIV because at no time were you at risk of contracting HIV.

question: Hi,I had received unprotected oral sex from a stripper one and a half years ago.  Nothing else.  I've had a couple of CBC tests done this past year because I have diabetes but no STD testing (partly because I'm too scared).  The CBC results came back fine.However, within this past month, I've had the case of hives that wont go away.  It is mainly on my arms and crotch area.  They appear for a couple of hours and then dissapear.  I took some over the counter medication and they stopped but when I'm off the medication, the hives reappear again.Could these be related to HIV and do I need to get tested for my activity?Thanks in advance.
title: HIV Hives?
